page.title: 09THE HALFWAY HOTEL
page.content: The Halfway Hotel is placed on the dual carriageway just outside Symington.At the Halfway Hotel the busiest night is a Saturday and the most popular drink is a pint of Tartan Special beer.Usually the Halfway goes through 3/4 of a barrel of beer per day depending on whether there is a function or not.There are about 28 people working in the Halfway.The most popular meal is Haddock and chips and the most expensive meal is steak.The Halfway opens at 11:00am and closes at 11:00pm.Here is a small part of the menu. Breast of Chicken Â£4.50 Chicken and Ham Â£4.25 Roast Silverside of Beef Â£4.80 Turkey Breast Â£4.65 Homemade Liver Pate Â£3.75 Mixed Cold Meat Â£4.50 Tongue Salad Â£4.50
